name: Elrond's Tranquil Poker Retreat
review: Splendid card decks, beautiful tables, service was magical and so was the staff, the second price I won was a Imac, but I gave that away as I don't like them one bit. Nevertheless a fantastic tournament, I'll come back next year!

name: Hobbiton Hold'em Haven
review: My buddy Bilbo lives here, and we go here all the time, the Ales are great, and I love the music, the ceilings are a bit low, but that never stopped me from having a great night!

name: Elrond's Tranquil Poker Retreat
review: This was my first and last cashgame with Orcs EVER! Yes maybe I had one too many Apple-tini's, as I was disgusted by the free grog, but they were loud, obnoxious, and some of them were farting during the game! Yuck!
